question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/loader/script.rs] [Script struct] [Clone amplification] Can the Clone implementation on Script (line 34) be exploited to amplify memory usage by rapidly cloning large scripts, causing resource exhaustion? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/loader/script.rs] [function_at()] [Function handle cache poisoning] Can an attacker craft scripts where function_refs contains FunctionHandle::Remote entries pointing to non-existent or malicious modules, later causing failed resolution or unauthorized calls? (High)

[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/loader/script.rs] [entry_point()] [Function pointer stability] When entry_point() returns Arc<Function>, can the Function's code vector be modified through interior mutability, executing different code than loaded? (Critical)
